channel.title: HELP Switching character rights, donator rights, and changing crowns. HELP
channel.description:
I'm using a 317 server. In the character files there is a donator = 0.
If I switch it to = 1 log in, it will not show that I am a donator. Then I log out, open my character file back up and it says donator = 0.
[b]Wtf?[/b]
If someone [b]can't help me with fixing that[/b] then I would like to make:
Character rights = 1 -Donator Character rights = 2 -Moderator Character rights = 3 -Admin Character rights = 4 -Co-owner/Owner.
If I do that then I will need to change the crowns...[b]also something I have no idea how to do..[/b].
Please help. [u]I would like to just make the donator = 1 work so I don't have to do all this extra $#!t. lol.[/u]
Help is greatly appreciated and will rep ++ ( If I could :/)
Thanks, Jason

item.title: HELP Switching character rights, donator rights, and changing crowns. HELP
item.dc:creator: @Paradox-PvP Paradox-PvP
item.description:
@Paradox-PvP wrote:

Make sure your logged off COMPLETELY before changing your “donator = 0” to “donator = 1”, Also if that doesnt work, Turn off Server then make yourself donator, Then turn back on and see if it has changed.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Switching character rights, donator rights, and changing crowns. HELP
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

I’m using a 317 server. In the character files there is a donator = 0.

If I switch it to = 1 log in, it will not show that I am a donator. Then I log out, open my character file back up and it says donator = 0.

Wtf?

If someone can’t help me with fixing that then I would like to make:

Character rights = 1 -Donator
Character rights = 2 -Moderator
Character rights = 3 -Admin
Character rights = 4 -Co-owner/Owner.

If I do that then I will need to change the crowns…also something I have no idea how to do….

Please help.
I would like to just make the donator = 1 work so I don’t have to do all this extra $#!t. lol.

Help is greatly appreciated and will rep ++ ( If I could :/)

Thanks,
Jason
